SVGTextPositioningElement.summary: The SVGTextPositioningElement interface is implemented by elements that support attributes that position individual text glyphs. It is inherited by and .

SVGTextPositioningElementDx.summary: The dx read-only property of the interface describes the x-axis coordinate of the or as an . It reflects the {{SVGAttr("dx")}} attribute's horizontal displacement of the individual text glyphs in the user coordinate system.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a list of <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric values in the reflect the horizontal displacements in the user coordinate system.

SVGTextPositioningElementDy.summary: The dy read-only property of the interface describes the y-axis coordinate of the or as an . It reflects the {{SVGAttr("dy")}} attribute's vertical displacement of the individual text glyphs in the user coordinate system.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a list of <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric values in the reflect the vertical displacements in the user coordinate system.

SVGTextPositioningElementRotate.summary: The rotate read-only property of the interface reflects the rotation of individual text glyphs, as specified by the {{SVGAttr("rotate")}} attribute of the given element.

SVGTextPositioningElementX.summary: The x read-only property of the interface describes the x-axis coordinate of the or as an . It reflects the {{SVGAttr("x")}} attribute's horizontal position of the individual text glyphs in the user coordinate system.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a list of <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric values in the reflect the x-coordinates in the user coordinate system.

SVGTextPositioningElementY.summary: The y read-only property of the interface describes the y-axis coordinate of the or as an . It reflects the {{SVGAttr("y")}} attribute's vertical position of the individual text glyphs in the user coordinate system.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a list of <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric values in the reflect the y-coordinates in the user coordinate system.
